manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_maixun_wedding_reply` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '规则编号', `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '所属帐号', `title` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT '规则名称', `thumb` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '规则图片', `description` varchar(500) NOT NULL COMMENT '规则介绍', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_maixun_wedding` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `date` bigint(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '婚礼时间', `hotel` varchar(50) COMMENT '酒店名称', `bride` varchar(255) COMMENT '新娘', `groom` varchar(255) COMMENT '新郎', `bridephone` varchar(255) COMMENT '新娘电话', `groomphone` varchar(255) COMMENT '新郎电话', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_maixun_wedding_user` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `openid` varchar(50) COMMENT 'openid', `nickname` varchar(50) COMMENT '微信昵称', `name` varchar(50) COMMENT '姓名', `phone` bigint(11) unsigned COMMENT '电话', `role` varchar(50) COMMENT '角色', `is_manager` int(2) COMMENT '是否创建者', `wid` int(11) COMMENT '婚礼id', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_maixun_wedding_system_case` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `date` bigint(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '执行时间', `title` varchar(50) COMMENT '标题', `content` TEXT COMMENT '简介', `config` TEXT COMMENT '配置', `package` int(2) COMMENT '套餐包', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_maixun_wedding_wedding_case` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `wid` int(10) unsigned COMMENT '婚礼id', `tid` int(10) unsigned COMMENT '系统caseid', `title` varchar(50) COMMENT '标题', `remarks` TEXT COMMENT '备注', `status` int(10) COMMENT '状态', `date` bigint(11) COMMENT '时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_maixun_wedding_system_item` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` varchar(50) unsigned COMMENT '标题', `icon` varchar(255) COMMENT '图标', `sort` int(5) COMMENT '排序', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_maixun_wedding_wedding_item` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `wid` int(10), `title` varchar(50) unsigned COMMENT '标题', `icon` varchar(255) COMMENT '图标', `price` int(11) COMMENT '开销', `info` varchar(255) COMMENT '备注', `date` bigint(11) COMMENT '时间', `stid` int(11) COMMENT '系统itemid', `status` int(2) COMMENT '状态', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
